speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi, I'm doing fine, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm glad to hear that. I'm reaching out regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Could you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying your identity. I see that you have a balance of $250 due. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I will note that down. Would you prefer to make that payment over the phone or online?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I will send you an email with the payment link shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that's all. Thank you for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
